name: Valentino Khan
description: '''Valentino Khan''' (born February 15, 1987) is an American [[Disc Jockey|DJ]] and producer born and raised in [[Los Angeles]]. He is best known for releasing material through [[Diplo]], [[Skrillex]] and [[Steve Aoki]]. His singles "Deep Down Low" and "Make Some Noise" peaked at number one and fifty respectively on the "''Billboard'' Twitter Emerging Artists" chart.
